general.gigTitle: do custom website development, full stack developer, front end backend developer

sellerCard.oneLiner: Expert Full Stack Developer for Every Web Need
sellerCard.description: Hi! I'm Ariful, a full-stack web developer with 3+ years of experience building high-performance websites. I specialize in creating custom, modern React front-ends and secure, scalable back-end solutions tailored to your brand’s needs. My focus is on delivering sleek, responsive designs and robust functionality that ensures your website performs flawlessly. Ready to elevate your online presence? Let’s collaborate and create something extraordinary! Reach out, and let's bring your vision to life!

description.content:
Are you ready to transform your ideas into a stunning, custom website?


As a seasoned full stack developer, I specialize in crafting custom website development that not only look great but also deliver exceptional performance. My experience as a front end developer & backend developer will help you create website, that will make a huge impact on your business.


Technologies:


Front end - Next.js, HTML, CSS, React.js

Back end - Laravel, JavaScript, PHP, Node.js, Express.js

Servers - Digital Ocean, AWS, cPanel 

CMS - WordPress, Webflow, Wix or Squarespace

Other - Figma, Photoshop, Lottie Animation, Framer


You'll Get:


  • Custom Business Website Development
  • Front end Development, Backend Development
  • Custom Web Application Development
  • Multi language, Responsive Design for All Devices
  • eCommerce website with Payment gateway, Shipping or Booking
  • API Integration


Our Process:


  • We work with you to understand your requirements
  • Create a stunning design from scratch, or show us a few web-sites that inspire you
  • See your fully functional web-site before going live
  • Continued support, even after your order is completed!


READY TO DIVE IN? Let's talk about your project before placing an order!

slide.name: do custom website development, full stack developer, front end backend developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: What information do I need to provide to start the project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started, I'll need details about your brand, your specific requirements for the website, any existing content or design preferences, and any functionality you want to include. It’s important to discuss these details first to ensure the best results.

questionsAndAnswers.question: For website redesigns, what technologies do you use?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: On the front end, I use Next.js, HTML, CSS, and React.js, and on the back end, I use Laravel, JavaScript, PHP, Node.js, Express.js, MySQL and MongoDB.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you build websites from scratch?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can build custom websites from scratch, including handling the front-end design and back-end functionality and ongoing management & maintenance through a separate project.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer e-commerce website development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can integrate e-commerce functionality into your website, allowing you to sell products or services online seamlessly. This includes shopping cart integration, payment gateways, and more.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is Domain & hosting included in the package?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, domain and hosting are a company's property registered to their name, which is provided by the client. However, I would love to help you find the best host domain in a custom package. Please feel free to message me anytime to discuss your requirements in detail

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you convert Figma to custom designs?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can share your Figma design and I can develop it into a pixel-perfect, responsive, custom website.

reviews.comment: An exceptional experience from start to finish! The booking system was developed with precision, delivering a sleek, user-friendly, and fully functional platform. Every detail, from real-time slot availability to admin controls, was flawlessly implemented. Communication was clear, and progress updates kept me confident throughout the process. The final product exceeded my expectations, balancing efficiency with a modern design. Highly recommend for anyone needing a high-quality MERN stack solution!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your kind review! I'm so glad you are happy with my job!

reviews.comment: It was a wonderful experience working with Ariful and I am definitely pleased with the results. I will definitely consider working with him again

seller_response.comment: It's always a pleasure to work with you. Thanks for your cooperation.

reviews.comment: I'm very happy with the feature edit. The seller was professional and clear throughout. Communication was prompt and friendly. They delivered exactly what I needed. The process was smooth and hassle-free. The update perfectly matches my vision. I highly appreciate their excellent work!

seller_response.comment: Thanks, I'm glad you got what you wanted. I would love to work with you again.

reviews.comment: Every detail was thoughtfully implemented, resulting in a sleek, user-friendly, and perfectly optimized food delivery platform!

seller_response.comment: Thanks so much for such good words for me.
Thanks for the order and the great review.
